column4: HI everyone, Does anybody know of any ubuntu software having similar functionality to pikybasket (windows only) - http://lifehacker.com/358571/copy-and-paste-scattered-files-with-piky-basket . thanks.
*: anyone?? i did google search but that didn't help
pyou can use find -exec paitrings to search for files which are so old / modified when etc and copy those
I want to interactively just go folder by folder and select files to be copied (GUI)..
